content: 3-hour mitts by chelsey clammer it was cold my sister lost the mitts i made her so i made her some new ones in 3 hours to keep her hands warm two sizes are included small/medium and large/extra-large these are really basic mitts and quick to knit enjoy materials us size 9 needles either 4 dpns or two 16 needles for the magic loop method chunky yarn 75 yards scissors yarn needle gauge 10 stitches x 12 row 2 x 2 sizes s/m l/xl abbreviations co cast on bobble bind off k knit p purl k2tog knit two together m1r make 1 right lift the bar between the next stitch with the left needle from the back to the front knit through the front loop m1l make 1 left lift the bar between the next stitch with the left needles from the front to the back knit through the back loop icelandic bind off knit the first stich place that stitch on the left-hand needle insert the right- hand needle through the stitch as if to purl then scoop up the next stitch and pull it off the left- hand needles allowing the first stich to fall off the needle put the new stitch on the left-hand needle and repeat for a stretchier version you can also knit the stitch as you scoop it up see video here https //www youtube com/watch v=g6-qqh1toik directions co 24 28 stitches divide evenly on 3 dpns or use magic loop to join in the round knit 1x1 rib k1 p1 for 8 10 row knit even for 6 8 row begin thumb gusset row 1 k3 m1r k1 m1l knit to end of round row 2 and all even row knit row 3 k3 m1r k3 m1l knit to end row 5 k3 m1r k5 m1l knit to end row 7 k3 m1r k7 m1l knit to end row 9 k3 m1r k9 m1l knit to end row 10 knit for size s/m continue to bind off the thumb for size l/xl row 11 k3 m1r k11 m1l knit to end row 12 knit all sizes bind off the thumb knit 3 using icelandic bind off bobble 11 13 stitches turn the work and co 1 stitch using knitted cast on method turn work and knit to end of round knit 8 10 rounds even knit 1x1 rib for 5 6 row bind off using a stretchy bind off i use the method where you k2tog through the back loop slip the stitch back to the left-hand needle knit that stitch and the next stitch together through the back loop etc break yarn weave in ends and repeat for the second mitt enjoy
